TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XamlLanguage extends System.Object
public ref class XamlLanguage abstract sealed

summary.span: 定义一些提供字符串或对象的常量，这些字符串或对象对于 XAML 标记或使用 XAML 类型进行的编程非常有用。

span.span: Defines constants that provide strings or objects that are useful for XAML markup or for programming with XAML types.

summary.span: 这些字符串或对象与 XAML 语言概念和/或 .NET Framework XAML 中 XAML 语言概念的实现有关。

span.span: These strings or objects are relevant to XAML language concepts, to the implementation of XAML language concepts in .NET Framework XAML Services, or to both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks API 返回查找结果基于保持内部的 XAML 架构上下文。The API returns lookup results that are based on a XAML schema context that remains internal. 在此架构上下文，是`true`。In this schema context, is `true`. 否则，为.NET Framework XAML 服务及其定义的 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器报告为默认值的 XAML 架构上下文使用默认设置。Otherwise, the XAML schema context that is reported as the default for .NET Framework XAML Services and its defined XAML readers and XAML writers uses default settings. 总体上而言，适用于预定义的 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器的 XAML 架构上下文取决于相同可从 Api 设置或返回的实例。Overall, the XAML schema context that is used for predefined XAML readers and XAML writers is based on the same instance that is available from APIs that set or return a . .NET Framework XAML 服务的默认 XAML 架构上下文取决于 CLR 概念和反射。The default XAML schema context for .NET Framework XAML Services is based on CLR concepts and reflection. 默认 CLR 支持的证据时可以找到获取某些属性都和检查时。Evidence of the default CLR backing can be found when obtaining certain properties that are a and when checking . 同样，属性都具有 CLR 基于反射的值的。Similarly, properties that are a have CLR reflection-based values for .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllDirectives As ReadOnlyCollection(Of XamlDirective)

summary.span: 获取由 .NET Framework XAML 服务定义的每个 标识符的只读泛型集合。

span.span: Gets a read-only generic collection of each identifier that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.

value.span: 由 .NET Framework XAML 服务定义的每个 标识符的只读泛型集合。

span.span: A read-only generic collection of each identifier that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllTypes As ReadOnlyCollection(Of XamlType)

summary.span: 获取单独 值的只读泛型集合，这些值与 XAML 语言内部值匹配或其别名设置为该内部值，并且是由 .NET Framework XAML 服务定义的。

span.span: Gets a read-only generic collection of individual values that match, or alias, a XAML language intrinsic that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.

value.span: 与 XAML 语言内部值匹配的每个 的只读泛型集合。

span.span: A read-only generic collection of each that matches a XAML language intrinsic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅[ [MS-XAML] 5.2 部分](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)有关内部 XAML 语言的信息项的列表。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525) for a list of intrinsic XAML language information items. 请注意，不是所有作为 5.2 子节列出的项作为实现。Note that not all items that are listed as subsections of 5.2 are implemented as a . 例如，`x:Code`不是类型。For example, `x:Code` is not a type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Arguments As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Arguments { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取工厂方法或泛型用法的 的 。

span.span: Gets a for the of a factory method or a generic usage.

value.span: 工厂方法或泛型用法的 的 。

span.span: A for the of a factory method or generic usage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工厂方法是[!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)]功能，用于标识构造 XAML 类型的基础类型的另一种方法。A factory method is a [!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)] feature for identifying an alternative technique that constructs the underlying type for a XAML type. `Arguments`指定的工厂方法的输入和启用在标记中指定该信息。The `Arguments` specify the input of a factory method and enable specifying that information in markup. 缺少工厂方法时的默认技术是尝试查找默认构造函数，然后尝试查找类型、 成员或目标类型标识的类型转换器。The default techniques, in absence of a factory method, are to attempt to find a default constructor and then attempt to find an identified type converter for type, member, or destination type. 对于泛型的用法，`Arguments`包装对象或指定为所需的所有构造输入的初始化文本`TypeArguments`。For the generic usage, the `Arguments` wrap the objects or initialization text of all construction inputs that are specified as necessary for the `TypeArguments`.

summary.span: 获取一个 ，它标识 XAML 的工厂方法。

span.span: Gets a that identifies a factory method for XAML.

value.span: 一个 ，它标识 XAML 的工厂方法。

span.span: A that identifies a factory method for XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工厂方法是[!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)]功能，用于标识构造 XAML 类型的基础类型的另一种方法。A factory method is a [!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)] feature for identifying an alternative technique that constructs the underlying type for a XAML type. 默认值的方法的工厂方法不可用，如果是尝试查找默认构造函数，然后再尝试查找类型、 成员或目标类型上标识的类型转换器。The default technique, if a factory method is unavailable, is to try to find a default constructor, and then try to find an identified type converter on type, member, or destination type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.3.10](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.10](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Initialization As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Initialization { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 中 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.
A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此指令表示 XAML 节点或 XAML 信息集的初始化文本表示形式，其中的字符串对象元素内的提供周围的对象元素的类型构造信息。This directive represents the XAML node or XAML information set representation of initialization text, where a string within an object element supplies the type construction information for the surrounding object element. 如果你正在寻求通过原始节点解释或可视化效果，`Initialization`有时在字符串的形式`_Initialization`（请注意前导下划线），并且在 XAML 语言 XAML 命名空间 (前面加来表示`Namespace`节点)。If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, `Initialization` is sometimes seen in string form as `_Initialization` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node). 在 [MS-XAML]，这一概念中的标题下`x:InitializationText`。In [MS-XAML], this concept is described under the heading `x:InitializationText`. 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.3.3 中所述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Items As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Items { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 中 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.
A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Items`指令是周围对象内的多个对象值的节点表示形式包装。An `Items` directive is a node representation wrapper around multiple object values within a surrounding object. 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.3.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). 如果你检查原始 XAML 节点流解释或可视化效果，`Items`有时在字符串的形式`_Items`（请注意前导下划线），并且在 XAML 语言 XAML 命名空间 (前面加来表示`Namespace`节点)。If you examine raw XAML node stream interpretations or visualizations, `Items` is sometimes seen in string form as `_Items` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node).

A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`Key`指令用于字典中的对象。A `Key` directive is used for objects in a dictionary. 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.3.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

value.span: 类型的 ，该类型是 的项类型。

span.span: A for the type that is the item type of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET Framework XAML 服务实现中， `Member` 由支持。In the .NET Framework XAML Services implementation, the `Member` is backed by .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Members As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Members { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 中 概念的 。

span.span: Gets a for the concept in XAML.
A for the concept in XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Members`概念 [MS-XAML] 中未专门定义。The `Members` concept is not specifically defined in [MS-XAML]. `Members` 是标记本身，而不是引用后备类型中定义的类型成员的概念。`Members` is a concept for defining members of types in markup itself, as opposed to referencing backing types. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Name As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Name { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 中 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.
A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`Name`指令用于在标记中的对象的标识符。A `Name` directive is used for identifiers of objects in markup. 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.3.4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). 尽管此概念`Name`不完全一致中 [MS-XAML]，通常可以使用指定使用`Name`指令或`Name`特性来提供 XAML 标记中的对象之间的概念连接xaml 创建的运行时表示和处理的标记。Although this concept of `Name` is not completely consistent with the use that is specified in [MS-XAML], you can typically use the `Name` directive or the `Name` attribute to provide a conceptual connection between XAML objects in markup and the run-time representations that are created by XAML processing of the markup. 这使用取决于如何特定框架上实现其编程模型，以将 XAML 集成到其常规对象模型。This use depends on how specific frameworks implement their programming models to integrate XAML into their general object models. 有关详细信息，请参阅[X:name 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)。For more information, see [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Null As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ Null { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 或 XAML 语言内部值的 。

span.span: Gets a for the or XAML language intrinsic.

value.span: A为 / XAML 语言内部函数。

span.span: A for the / XAML language intrinsic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 XAML 类型提供的标记中的对象值的 null 值。This XAML type provides null values for object values in markup. 是 XAML 类型 （或必须） 分配给`MarkupExtension`。The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to `MarkupExtension`. 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.2.4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

A for the XAML language concept.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 指定`x:Object`作为特殊语言概念。XAML specifies `x:Object` as a special language concept. 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.2.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ PositionalParameters { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 中 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.
A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `PositionalParameters` 是包装可以指定为一组输入标记扩展的对象节点的多个对象的指令。`PositionalParameters` is a directive that wraps the multiple objects that can be specified as a set of object nodes for input of a markup extension. 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 6.6.7](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 6.6.7](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). 如果你正在寻求通过原始节点解释或可视化效果，`PositionalParameters`有时在字符串的形式`_PositionalParameters`（请注意前导下划线），并且在 XAML 语言 XAML 命名空间 (前面加来表示`Namespace`节点)。If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, `PositionalParameters` is sometimes seen in string form as `_PositionalParameters` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Reference` 是[!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)]功能，用于引用在标记中的另一个对象节点。`Reference` is a [!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)] feature for referencing another object node in the markup. 对于.NET Framework XAML 服务实现位于。The implementation for .NET Framework XAML Services is found in .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Shared As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Shared { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 的 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive for XAML.
A for the directive for XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`Shared`指令 (当设置为`true`) 指定当在字典中找到的项，对对象的引用应始终返回而不是的新实例的单一实例。A `Shared` directive (when it is set to `true`) specifies that when an item is found in a dictionary, references to the object should always return the singleton instead of a new instance. 此行为与，字典可用于作为源的共享的内容或模板机制通过使用 XAML 的特定框架的概念。This behavior is related to the concept that a dictionary might be used as a source for a shared content or template mechanism by particular frameworks that use XAML. `Shared` [MS-XAML] 中未指定但属于`x`定义命名空间 – 行为 XAML 在 WPF 和.NET Framework 版本 3.0 和 3.5 版。`Shared` is not specified in [MS-XAML] but is part of the `x` namespace–defined behavior for XAML in WPF and .NET Framework version 3.0 and version 3.5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 XAML 类型提供的标记后备成员所在的静态成员的值。This XAML type provides values for markup where the backing member is a static member. 是 XAML 类型 （或必须） 分配给`MarkupExtension`。The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to `MarkupExtension`. 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.2.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.3.8](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.8](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SynchronousMode As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ SynchronousMode { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 ，利用它可以通过异步方式加载 XAML（如果 XAML 处理器支持此类模式）。

span.span: Gets a that enables loading XAML asynchronously if the XAML processor supports such a mode.

value.span: 一个 ，利用它可以通过异步方式加载 XAML。

span.span: A that enables loading XAML asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`SynchronousMode`指令 (当设置为`Async`) 用于指定当加载 XAML 文件时，首先处理根节点。A `SynchronousMode` directive (when set to `Async`) is used to specify that when a XAML file is loaded, the root node is processed first. 可以插入生成的对象，即使仍在处理其内容。The resulting object can be inserted even though its content is still processing. 在此模式下可以跳过从最深节点到根工作的默认 XAML 处理行为。In this mode you can bypass the default XAML processing behavior of working from deepest node to the root. 默认情况下的 XAML 处理逻辑，正在等待的根对象的任何调用方会被阻止，直到完整分析已完成。In the default processing logic for XAML, any caller that is waiting for the root object is blocked until the full parse is complete. `SynchronousMode` [MS-XAML] 中未指定但属于`x`xaml 中.NET Framework 版本 3.5 SP1 （或任何后续的 service pack） 开始的 WPF 的命名空间定义的行为。`SynchronousMode` is not specified in [MS-XAML] but is part of the `x` namespace–defined behavior for XAML in WPF beginning in .NET Framework version 3.5 with SP1 (or any subsequent service pack).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TimeSpan As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ TimeSpan { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 语言中 概念的 。

span.span: Gets a for the concept in XAML language.
A for the XAML language concept.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.2.16](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.16](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). `TimeSpan` 不是真正的内部函数，但因为它是常用的类型的 XAML 规范中指定。`TimeSpan` is not a true intrinsic, but was specified in the XAML specification because it is a commonly used type. XAML 规范作者视为有用标准化中派生的词汇的 XAML 表示形式。The XAML specification authors considered it useful to standardize the XAML representation in derived vocabularies. 另请参阅[常见 XAML 语言基元的内置类型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives.md)。See also [Built-in Types for Common XAML Language Primitives](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Type As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ Type { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 / XAML 语言内部值的 。

span.span: Gets a for the / XAML language intrinsic.

value.span: A为 / XAML 语言内部函数。

span.span: A for the / XAML language intrinsic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 XAML 类型提供使用中，绑定的值和查找到的后备类型系统。This XAML type provides values that use bindings from, and lookups to, a backing type system. 是 XAML 类型 （或必须） 分配给`MarkupExtension`。The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to `MarkupExtension`. 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.2.3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TypeArguments As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ TypeArguments { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 中 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.
A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`TypeArguments`指令指定泛型类型约束时泛型指定为一个 XAML 对象。A `TypeArguments` directive specifies the type constraints of a generic when a generic is specified as a XAML object. 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.3.11](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.11](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Uid As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Uid { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 中 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.
A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`Uid`指令指定 XAML 标记元素的唯一标识符。A `Uid` directive specifies a unique identifier for a XAML markup element. 严格地说，此类的唯一标识符可以应用到的 XAML 实现框架内有多种用途。Strictly speaking, such a unique identifier could be applied to several purposes within a XAML-implementing framework. `Uid` 不同于`Name`在于`Name`声明在对象图形输出 XAML 的源中存在的标识符，而 [MS-XAML] 定义中具有特定角色`Uid`具有任何特定的角色。`Uid` differs from `Name` in that `Name` has a specific role in the [MS-XAML] definition for declaring the identifiers that exist in an object graph output from a XAML source, whereas `Uid` has no specific role. 在使用.NET Framework XAML 服务的现有 XAML 实现框架`Uid`通常用于本地化目的。In the existing XAML-implementing frameworks that use .NET Framework XAML Services, `Uid` is typically used for localization purposes. 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.3.6](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.6](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UnknownContent As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ UnknownContent { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 中 指令的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.
A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UnknownContent` 是一个是一个占位符，以在 XAML 节点集如果读取器遇到未知的值节点的内容中使用的指令或初始化文本 （没有可用的内部函数或文本语法可以将其转换）。`UnknownContent` is a directive that is a placeholder to use in a XAML node set if a reader encounters unknown content for a value node or initialization text (no available intrinsic or text syntax can convert it). 如果你正在寻求通过原始节点解释或可视化效果，`UnknownContent`有时在字符串的形式`_UnknownContent`（请注意前导下划线），并且在 XAML 语言 XAML 命名空间 (前面加来表示`Namespace`节点)。If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, `UnknownContent` is sometimes seen in string form as `_UnknownContent` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Uri As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ Uri { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XAML 语言概念的 。

span.span: Gets a for the XAML language concept.
A for the XAML language concept.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅[ [MS-XAML]部分 5.2.15](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.15](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). `Uri` 不是 true 内部函数，而 XAML 规范中指定，因为它是常用的类型。`Uri` is not a true intrinsic but was specified in the XAML specification because it is a frequently used type. XAML 规范作者视为有用标准化中派生的词汇的 XAML 表示形式。The XAML specification authors considered it useful to standardize the XAML representation in derived vocabularies. 另请参阅[常见 XAML 语言基元的内置类型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives.md)。See also [Built-in Types for Common XAML Language Primitives](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives.md).

summary.span: 该命名空间对应于 [[MS-XAML] 第 5.1.1 节](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)中定义的 XAML (2006)“x”前缀命名空间。

span.span: That namespace corresponds to the XAML (2006) "x" prefixed namespace as defined in [[MS-XAML] Section 5.1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
